website_summaries.verdict: Great features and price, especially if you are looking for  Bluetooth capabilities.
pros: Affordable, charge your smartphone, listen to music through Bluetooth sync, great radio, battery backup, and a surprisingly good speaker
cons: The alarm isn't nearly as loud as some others

customer_reviews.title: Great player, very cool lights, I overslept the two weeks I tried it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lights, really good sound. But. The alarm plays only the first song in the queue and ONLY ONE MINUTE. So I slept through the music every time. The bird twitter works for wake up but is annoying and not the slow awakening I am looking for. If you are looking for a nice player with cool lights this is a fun and nice sounding clock and I highly recommend it. If you need an alarm clock it is not the best choice. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: The most important part is the worst part- the sound for the alarm is a disturbing, warped cacophony of bird chirping. There are no other choices, and you can't use bluetooth to set an alarm sound/song. The only option is to put a file on a drive and plug it in. Also, if you're not actively using it, the time doesn't display- you have to tap the top of it to turn it on, then it'll turn back off in a minute. I'd rather have a $5 functional alarm clock and get some nice bluetooth speakers. The directions are terrible as well. Very much regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working today after 1.5 years...
customer_reviews.text: However, it was a good product while it lasted. The operating OS was clunky, but I found that the clock had lots of functionality. Used it as a reading light and music player when I wanted to read outside. The alarm was loud and annoying, so that's' good. It also kept a charge pretty long... Until now lol. I wish I had at least 6 more months with it. I feel like most of my electronics give out at about 2 years. That's my expectation, though most electronics should probably last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this! The USB port doesn't work to charge devices. Taking it out of the box it was confusing to set up the time and has military time. Then the clock stopped working the first day I got it and froze at 1:14AM. In addition, you have to charge it like you charge phone, which is a pain. Very disappointed. Too much hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Jean

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Crap
customer_reviews.text: Horribly translated instructions. Makes buzzing sound through speaker when Bluetooth is turned on. The Alarm, which was the reason for purchasing in the first place, doesn't work. Two very capable people attempted to set the alarm multiple times to no availe! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Casper

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality with room for improvement in functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and design. It serves as an excellent night light with fun LED color options. The sound quality is pretty good for a little speaker. Note: you will need to but a MicroSD if you want to store any kind of music files on this device. You may also have to convert music files to an MP3 format in order to play them. The blue tooth functions seems to work fine. There is definitely room for improvement with controls /functionality and it would have been nice if it came with a cord so you can plug it in. Overall, not a bad value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the build quality, completely made from plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for the build quality, completely made from plastic and the color of lights Are limited and Bluetooth function require reconnection every time. The alarm function only come standard with bird noises and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: No FM radio, but great otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item, but I had to return it as I was mistaken when I thought it had FM radio capabilities. I need a radio, but also want to use my mp3's as well. I really liked the light feature on this, it would be great for a teen if they don't want a radio.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F

customer_reviews.title: Hassle to program...
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan. It isn't as easy as I had hoped to program. It makes super loud bird noises for the alarm. A nice speaker, but that was not the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: IrishEyes218

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly the right dimensions for the space. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly the right dimensions for the space. However, there was no literature to tell me how to set it. I got the time set after about an hour of trial and error and an alarm after another fifteen minutes or so. No manual is no bueno. Otherwise, it would have been rated a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS READ THE REVIEWS!!
customer_reviews.text: Time stopped after 3 days of use, along with all the buttons on top. The only thing it does now is turn colors. When it did work you had to tap the clock to see the time. Wish I read the reviews but I went off the averaged star review and not the details :( The box is gone so no luck in returning it. Wish I had not bought it.
customer_reviews.author: kfrn

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY BUT BEREAVED!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on Amazon and liked it very much---so much, in fact, that when it died this week with some ambivalence I ordered another. The premature demise of my first purchase is the only thing that kept me from giving this 5 stars. I will await results with my replacement and upgrade or downgrade my evaluation accordingly. The price for this versatile product seemed at the time of my first purchase "too good to be true." If my second one fails, I guess it was!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Severance

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Stopped working after 1week of use. Night light is the only thing that still works. My daughter is very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Makana

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy crap. No a/c adapter only charges usb, menus are the cheapest bare bones crap you could possibly get. Another chinese rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Curriculum Vitae

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy camper.
customer_reviews.text: Directions impossible to follow. Impossible to load an SD card to listen to music. Impossible to program the alarm. No online manual or instructions. Other than a pretty glowing box with cool colors, worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Otherwise Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this. Annoying to charge and the clock doesn't stay on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good speaker. The light color changes and it is pretty. The sound is clear and loud.
customer_reviews.author: Hyejin Park

customer_reviews.title: i got it mainly as a backup alarm clock. ...
customer_reviews.text: i got it mainly as a backup alarm clock. in my opinion, its made for someone with a desk job. Just to set the record straight it "does not" have a radio option. hope this review helps
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker with cool colors and good bass for it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker with cool colors and good bass for it's size. Not the easiest operating alarm clock so I just use it as a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Barely six months since I got it and it already doesn't work. It only occasionally turns on and doesn't stay on. Useless now. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Makaliinani

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Speaker for Teen or Preteen - Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this Bluetooth its a simple device that works and works well. It looks good, sounds good and is easy to use. Great for any teen or preteen bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Showing where but not bad for all purpose alarm clock and everything
customer_reviews.text: It's okay music non-stop but is showing somewhere ,been a couple months
customer_reviews.author: SARAH PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: In the trash!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage, totally user unfriendly, waste of money!!! Thought it would be a good idea to use this with Amazon dot. NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday to play music, the alarm feature is annoying to me so I don't use it. Other that it is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryINC.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: battery started dying too soon on the two i got after just a few months
customer_reviews.author: D5e

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not loud and time gets hidden in use
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute looking and I liked the touch light options. But two flaws: if you're using the Bluetooth speaker then the display will not show the clock. It says "blue" or something. Silly that you can't see the time while it's in use. Also the speaker volume at max is not as loud as my iPhone max volume, which defeats the purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't say how much I love it! My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how much I love it! My favorite, wasn't super hard to set up. Once I got it set up I'm hooked
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and Bluetooth and colored lights
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and Bluetooth and colored lights! But my daughter was terrified of the alarm... so loud and birds sound... we use it as a speaker and we bought another alarm
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Great clock/speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound, the light works really well and I love that it is touch activated, bluetooth works without any issues. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: The light/clock is very good too. The only problem I've had is a ...
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it was advertised to do. I hooked it up to my echo dot just for a little more volume and quality and it works very well. The light/clock is very good too. The only problem I've had is a buzz at higher volumes, especially if it's charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started slowly breaking a month in and finally kicked the ...
customer_reviews.text: Started slowly breaking a month in and finally kicked the bucket today (month 5). Don’t buy unless you only need the speaker for a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: HELP!!!! My daughter loves the idea ...
customer_reviews.text: HELP!!!! My daughter loves the idea but the clock now won't stay on nor will the light! Can anyone help???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works way much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It works way much better than expected! It arrived charged so I was able to start using it from day one!
customer_reviews.author: B. F.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything that I wanted, not user friendly, just wanted something to wake me up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The alarm is loud and terrifying and I have no idea how to change it because the instructions are bad.
customer_reviews.text: As many others have noted, the directions are horrible. They're in broken English and they're hard to make sense of. Also, the alarm is horrible. First morning waking up to it today and it scared the shit out of me. It's supposed to be birds chirping or something? I don't really remember, waking up was a blur of terror and loud, horrible bird noises. Did I mention the alarm is loud? Yeah, kind of a problem if you have roommates. But if you don't mind waking up everyone else in the house, then this is the alarm clock for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not a good alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent speaker but the alarm is not for heavy sleeper at all.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoshu Lu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. No sound from stereo and no clock
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!! RETURNED IT.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers state, when playing a file on the SD card for the alarm it shuts off after about a minute. No snooze. Why even have the feature of playing a file for the alarm if it isn't continuous with a snooze option. Also the workaround for having the time constantly display further exposes the poor engineering that went into this thing. I guess the people giving 5 stars are not interested in having a real functioning alarm clock...
customer_reviews.author: MaiTai

customer_reviews.title: the colors changed with a tap on top and that was very cool. But the speaker sound wasn't good quality
customer_reviews.text: As shown, the colors changed with a tap on top and that was very cool. But the speaker sound wasn't good quality; you can hear a little buzzing noise. Another con about this product is, it takes a very long time to charge. I charged my phone overnight for about five hours and it only charged about 60%. And the next morning, when I was trying to use the Bluetooth speaker, the speaker battery died quick.
customer_reviews.author: joanna hong

customer_reviews.title: The Birds
customer_reviews.text: Buttons not very user friendly. Alarm is awful sounding attack birds, Trying to figure out how to change the sound to one on an SD card. Not good for an alarm, more for a mantel clock or something. Speaker sounds good, lights work good, connected to Bluetooth easily. Kids would probably like it.
customer_reviews.author: great laker

customer_reviews.title: I just give 3* because it was perfectly working. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just give 3* because it was perfectly working. I used a lot the speaker when I was in the kitchen listen to music over my computer and for the night the light to read when my husband was a sleep. But now nothing works more exept the light. it just worked for a half year.
customer_reviews.author: Gina4you

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for a Baby's room.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, we put it in a baby's room and we use the light to change her at night. It has AUX,Bluetooth and micro memory card. We loaded this puppy up with lots of baby music for the baby to sleep at night. It has the clock feature so I can time myself on the feedings. Overall It's a great product and loud too. Battery option to take it with you anywhere is a great feature too. Doesn't feel cheap. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Team Siles

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it and i even enjoy it. pretty ambient light setting
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it and i even enjoy it. pretty ambient light setting. pretty color settings. alarm and bluetooth is very useful as well. i highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ko kim

customer_reviews.title: The alarm makes an awful noise(supposed to be a bird however it just sounds like straight static) and there's only that one option UNLESS ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to set up, directions are not clearly stated. The alarm makes an awful noise(supposed to be a bird however it just sounds like straight static) and there's only that one option UNLESS you have time & want to upload sounds on an SD card and use that.
customer_reviews.author: s_odum

customer_reviews.title: A bluetooth speaker attached to an almost non-functional clock and lamp
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I bought this as an alarm clock, thinking that the lamp and speaker were a bonus. I'm disappointed by the number of button presses (about 15) and menu confusion to set or switch on the alarm. It's also disappointing that the clock readout goes black after about 30 seconds, probably to save power. The English instructions appear to have been hilariously, ineptly google-translated from a foreign tongue.
customer_reviews.author: inkslinger

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious to operate
customer_reviews.text: This was the most obnoxious thing to operate. Not intuitive at all. Have to cycle through every setting to get time set, including the one that makes obnoxious AM radio sounds, and every color option of the light. Did not come with a power adapter/cable. I gave it to my kid to use as a night light. She's using my old cell phone charger to power it. Lord help me if I ever have to set the time on it again though. I might just throw it in the trash instead. Don't bother with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This clock features with no snooze or the ability to display non-military time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Bluetooth connects easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my office. Works great. Bluetooth connects easily. Colors are not necessary for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: It's not quite easy to set the alarm
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are complicated. It's not quite easy to set the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cox

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!! Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 11 yr old son. For the price, it's great. Sound is clear, even on highest volume. Nite lite has 3 settings. Very brite lite. Love the Bluetooth. My son had an ihome alarm clock with nite light. Paid 30.00 more n it sucked!!! This one is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 1 day
customer_reviews.text: After 24 hours, the On/Bluetooth and Mode buttons were unresponsive and the LED display stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: santino737
